name: Cindy McCain
summary: Widow of Senator John McCain who endorsed Joe Biden in 2020, saying 'we need supported leaders who will bring respect back to the White House.'

keyStatements.quote: My husband John lived by a code: country first. We are Republicans, yes, but Americans foremost. There's only one candidate in this race who stands up for our values as a nation, and that is Joe Biden.
I decided to endorse Joe Biden because we need supported leaders who will bring respect back to the White House.
Trump has no empathy. He attacks everyone. We need someone who actually cares about people.

timeline.event: Witnessed Trump's attacks on her husband
Appointed U.S. Ambassador to UN Agencies
